name: Aeldero
description:
Aeldero

*NOTE* This is a early access game which means that bugs will be encountered, and im hoping to get honest feedback. Because this is a early access things may change!

Aeldero is a lowpoly survival game. It's set out on a floating island out in space. Trees and vegitation is growing and you will have to use the islands recources to survive.

Gameplay Notes:

1# You can switch between weapons and tools using the numberpads.
2# Use the axe to get wood from trees.
3# Press 'F' to harvest both berries and cotton from plants.
4# Foxes can be shot, but to get meat from them you first have to press 'F'.
5# Berries is currently the only way to get water.
6# You can use the Options to turn down volume or to change graphics.
7# Use the crafting menu (C) to craft walls, campfire, arrows and more.
8# You can craft a sleepingbag which is a savepoint if you die.
9# There is a day and night cycle, so be aware of the dark.

Controls:

Move: A/W/S/D
Look Around: Mouse
Interact / Use: F
Crafting Menu: C
Run: Left Shift
Use Weapons: Mouse 1
Pause Menu / Options: Escape
Developer Console: F5

Please give me some honest feedback!

~Flux
